name: VR_ShootingRange
description:
Game where you can shoot "realistic" guns.

It has a multiplayer feature what should work to some extend at least. You can see and speak to each other.

(How to play)

Game testing is done with htc vive but it works with oculus as well (I'm not 100% sure if all of the key bindings work properly tho).

In main menu you need to press trigger button while pointing at the icons(You will see a laser when you point at it).

To move the player in game scene. Use the thumb "button" (left hand controller).

To rotate the player in game scene. Use the thumb "button" (right hand controller).

To pick up a gun or a mag. Press grip button while pointing at the object.

To drop an item. Press grip button again.

To shoot a gun. Press trigger button while holding the gun(ak can shoot full auto, pistol is a single shot).

To release a magazine from the gun. Press menu button(looks like 3 lines on top of each other) while holding the gun(Works on htc vive not sure about oculus).

To insert a magazine to the gun. Just move a magazine underneath the magazine well.
